Have a great weekend!

WolfIQ Support

12 Dec 2025, 11:45 GMT+11

Hi Jenn,

I hope you're doing well. Thank you so much for confirming.

Just a quick note to let you know that everything should be up and running now - the name has been updated to Dr Farshad Kasraei as requested, and the listing is live.

View the link here: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre/

Everything on the page has been fully updated, and all elements should now be functioning smoothly and exactly as intended to ensure a seamless experience for visitors.


Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything else you'd like us to adjust - we're always happy to help.

Warmly,
Marcelo Meneses
support@wolfiq.com.au

{#HS:3164205858-181332#}

Summary of Issue

Client requested an update on the “Find a Treatment Centre” page under New South Wales – Greenwich, NSW HEALTHiClinic to add a doctor’s name.
  • Initial request: Add Dr. Farshad as highlighted in screenshot.
  • Final update requested: Change name to Dr Farshad Kasraei.
Client requested estimates be approved before applying any changes live.

Action Items Taken

  • Provided initial estimate (~30 mins), later revised to 15 mins after clarifying page location and update scope.
  • Applied changes to staging/draft instance for review.
  • Shared staging link with client for confirmation: Staging Link
  • Awaited client approval to push to live.
  • Updated doctor’s name to Dr Farshad Kasraei as per final request.
  • Published the listing live: Live Page Link

Conclusion

  • Status: Completed / Live
  • All requested updates are now applied.
  • The page is fully updated and functioning as intended, ensuring a smooth experience for visitors.
  • Client notified that everything is live and confirmed.

Hi Jenn,

I hope you're doing well. Thank you so much for confirming.

Just a quick note to let you know that everything should be up and running now — the name has been updated to Dr Farshad Kasraei as requested, and the listing is live.

View the link here: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre/

Everything on the page has been fully updated, and all elements should now be functioning smoothly and exactly as intended to ensure a seamless experience for visitors.


Please don’t hesitate to reach out if there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust — we’re always happy to help.

  • Locating the correct page and section.
  • Making the updates on a staging/draft page.
  • Applying the changes live.
  • Ensuring there are no display, link, or layout issues once live.

Hi Jenn,

Just to confirm, we’ve spoken with our manager, and she’s fully on board with this. For this particular update, we’re happy to offer a 15-minute estimate to complete it efficiently for you.

The original estimate was 30 minutes because it usually includes:

  • Locating the correct page and section.
  • Making the updates on a staging/draft page.
  • Applying the changes live.
  • Ensuring there are no display, link, or layout issues once live.

For this, we can estimate 15 minutes because we already know the correct page location and the specific section to update from yesterday’s attempt. This allows us to streamline the work without compromising accuracy or quality.

Please note, this is not an additional charge — it’s simply an adjustment to the original estimate given the information we now have.

If you’re happy with this approach, we’ll proceed with the update on the staging page first. Once confirmed, we can move forward with any further steps as needed.

Thanks again for your patience and guidance — let me know if you need anything else, always happy to help!

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30803) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30803 Jenn Nebres (Combinate Support) 10 Dec 2025, 10:32 GMT+11 Hi Marcelo, Thank you for that. Regarding the estimates, since this is a simple text update on the page, would it really take 30 minutes to complete? Is it possible for this work to be done in 15 minutes or less? Regards, Jenn Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 10 Dec 2025, 09:01 GMT+11 Hi Jenn, Hope you're doing well. My sincere apologies for the confusion earlier, and thank you for bringing it to my attention. I take full accountability for moving forward on the draft page prematurely. I completely understand your workflow preference now, and will proceed once the client has approved the estimate:
  • Add the update via the staging page as requested.
  • Ensure the changes are ready for review before going live.
Please let me know once the client has approved, and I'll proceed with adding the update to staging so it's ready for review. Thank you for your patience and guidance, it's much appreciated. Warmly, Marcelo Meneses support@wolfiq.com.au Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star Google reviews ✔ Launch landing pages for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run digital health checks on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with website heatmaps Just reply to this email with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services). About your Care Plan • Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month. • Essentials - 15 minutes / Pro - 120 minutes / Expert - 300 minutes. • Additional is billed at $147/hr (ex GST) at the end of the month. • Anything else we can help with? Start a new email-it helps us move faster and serve you better. _____________________________ {#HS:3164205858-181332#}

Hi Jenn,

Hope you're doing well.

My sincere apologies for the confusion earlier, and thank you for bringing it to my attention. I take full accountability for moving forward on the draft page prematurely.

I completely understand your workflow preference now, and will proceed once the client has approved the estimate:

  • Add the update via the staging page as requested.
  • Ensure the changes are ready for review before going live.

Please let me know once the client has approved, and I’ll proceed with adding the update to staging so it’s ready for review.

Thank you for your patience and guidance, it’s much appreciated.

Hi @allieB,

Apologies for the oversight on my end — thank you so much for flagging this. I really appreciate the reminder and the guidance.

I’ll make sure moving forward that we don’t action any Combinate tickets (including this one) until the client has approved the estimate first.

Thanks again for your patience, and sorry for the extra back-and-forth. 🙏

Hey @marcelo 👋

Just a quick heads-up moving forward with all Combinate tickets.

Let’s hold off on working on any tickets (including this one:
https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3164205858/181332?viewId=2307528) unless the client has given approval first.

The client specifically asked that we provide an estimate first for approval before proceeding, so we’ll pause execution until that’s confirmed.

Really appreciate your understanding on this, thank you so much! 🫶

@allieB Closing this ticket for now. Will reopen this once the client has responded and given feedback of the recent request. Will follow up tomorrow morning.

Client: OncoBeta / Combinate

Reported Issue: Request to add a doctor to the HEALTHiClinic listing on the “Find a Treatment Centre” page.

Details:
  • Location: New South Wales – Greenwich, NSW HEALTHiClinic
  • Doctor to add: Dr. Farshad
  • Screenshot provided highlighting placement: [link in request]

Action Taken:
  • Initial review estimated update would take ~30 minutes.
  • Draft version of the page updated with Dr. Farshad added as requested: draft link
  • Requested client review for confirmation before publishing live.

Next Steps:
  • Await client approval to push changes live.
  • Make any additional adjustments if requested during review.

Status: Draft update completed, pending client confirmation.

Hi Jenn,

Thanks again for providing the details and screenshot.

We’ve gone ahead and made the update on a draft version of the Find a Treatment Centre page, adding Dr. Farshad under New South Wales – Greenwich, NSW HEALTHiClinic exactly as highlighted.

View the link here: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre-2/

Could you please review the draft and confirm if everything looks correct and as expected? Once we receive your approval, we’ll publish the changes live on the site.

If there’s anything else you’d like adjusted while reviewing, just let us know — we’re happy to make any tweaks to ensure it’s perfect.

Hi Jenn,

Thanks for reaching out and providing the details.

We can definitely make the update to the Find a Treatment Centre page and add Dr. Farshad under New South Wales – Greenwich, NSW HEALTHiClinic as highlighted in your screenshot.

Based on our initial review, we estimate this update will take approximately 30 minutes to complete. Once we have your client’s approval, we can proceed and confirm when it’s done.

Please let us know if there’s anything else you’d like us to review while we prepare for the update.
